resources.string: Long ago, Olympus was an impregnable fortress of the gods, where peace and harmony reigned. But one day the depths of Tartarus released the most terrible creatures: the Minotaur, Medusa the Gorgon and the many-headed Hydra. Their goal is to destroy the sacred gates of Olympus and overthrow Zeus, the chief protector of the gods.
Minotaur Description: A huge, strong creature with the body of a man and the head of a bull. The Minotaur is the easiest enemy in the game. Mechanics: One hit is enough to destroy. Features: Fast

Medusa Gorgon Description: A terrifying woman with snakes instead of hair. Her gaze hides a magical power that makes everyone who sees her freeze. Mechanics: Requires two hits to destroy. Features: The fastest.

Hydra Description: A multi-headed serpent, a legendary creature that will test your agility and reaction. Mechanics: Requires three hits to destroy. Features: The strongest and slowest enemy. The more Hydra appears, the harder it is to avoid damage.
Zeus releases lightning at all visible enemies, thereby destroying them.
Zeus summons a storm that creates a strong gust of wind and hinders enemies from advancing.
From the power of Zeus, the very earth trembles and the enemies turn to flee. Takes a small amount of damage.
Gives you the ability to use one of your abilities even when it is on cooldown, or gives you extra points. Fortune doesn't always smile on Zeus.
